Accelerate Digital Transformation with Faster Workday Integration
M&A Strategy through Integration : adapting to the new world order of disruptive business models
Say hello if you’re at digital disruption and transformation telecoms!  SnapLogic is the ultimate platform to assist telcos On transformations!  So we’re in the right place!

o Assisting with International Expansion into EMEASnapLogic allows enterprise IT organizations and lines of business to connect faster.  Accelerate the adoption of cloud apps like Workday, Salesforce and ServiceNow.  Get more from your big data investments and power modern analytics.  Re-think legacy approaches to data and application integration with a unified integration platform as a service (iPaaS).

Professional SaaS Sales Development Representative working with enterprise organizations to eliminate the complexity associated with app, data, and big data integration in the cloud and on-premises.  Key Responsibilities:o Diligently prospecting into Global 2000 companies targeting key decision makers to provide the SnapLogic value proposition and secure next stepso Educating, qualifying, and developing inbound leads to create sales-ready leads and opportunitieso Providing constant communication and visibility to prospects throughout the sales cycleo Researching target accounts to identify key decision makers while developing account strategies to create opportunity and valueo Collaborating with marketing to drive demand from target accountso Working closely with a Global Account Manager to develop account strategies and transition opportunitieso Acting as a trusted resource while nurturing strong relationships with prospectso Maintaining detailed lead / opportunity information in Salesforce.como Consistently achieving qualified opportunity quotas to ensure territory revenue objectivesTerritories - San Francisco Bay Area, Southern California, PNW, Mountain, Mid-Atlantic, SoutheastThe SnapLogic Elastic Integration Platform connects big data, applications and APIs in a Snap. With hundreds of pre-built connectors, called Snaps, and a scale-out architecture designed for enterprise deployments, we’re the industry’s only integration platform as a service (iPaaS) built to handle real-time data synchronization between cloud and on-premise applications (Salesforce, Workday, ServiceNow, SAP, Oracle) and big data integration requirements (Snowflake, AWS, Azure, MongoDB).
HYLA Mobile - Extending the Life Cycle of Mobile Devices

National Account Manager responsible for cultivating strong relationships that motivate, educate, excite, and generate growth around Hyla Mobiles’ trade-in software program with Verizon Wireless (VZW) Regional Presidents, Regional Directors, and District Managers. Key Contributions:o	Lead Account Manager for VZW indirect “Big 6” Premium Retailer, consisting of 205 stores. Increased attach rates by more than 10% from 6% to 18% through relationship-management, fieldwork, webinars, and creating excitement around new revenue opportunities related to the trade-in software. Contributed to software development recommendations.

summary: Ambitious cloud computing professional working with Global 2000 companies to provide cutting edge, cloud based software solutions that enable business growth and technical agility.  Experience presenting the full value of SaaS relative to complex enterprise IT environments.  Adept at "connecting the dots" within complex organizations.  I have a thorough understanding of the cloud computing industry including cutting edge technology ecosystems related to Hadoop, Applications, Analytics, and IoT. Specialties:•	Enterprise SaaS Sales•       Hunter Mentality•	Global 2000 Account Management•	Fast-Paced Startup Environment Experience•	Salesforce.com Power User•       Selling Complex and Technical Software Solutions•       Meticulous Attention to Detail•       Track Record of Meeting or Exceeding Goals •	Strong Knowledge and Passion for Cloud App, Data, and Big Data Technologies•	Entrepreneurial Spirit•	Superior Time and Territory Management•	Cloud Computing Industry Acumen•	C-Level to Business Champion Relationship Management•	Sales Development Expert•	Public Speaking and Leading Presentations for Large Audiences•	Sales Team Training and Management
